name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ESUIT | Anti Popup Comments for Facebook‚Ñ¢

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Now you won't have to click the 'All comments' button every time you want to read the comments.

Features:
- Automatically switch to all comments
- Stop Popup Comments
- Autoload Comments üëç

Facebook is a social platform where people interact and engage with each other‚Äôs posts. You can comment on someone‚Äôs post, and when people comment on your post, you can view the various comments. However, Facebook uses the comment ranking feature where instead of showing you all the comments, it filters them based on relevance. If you are tired of these comment rankings, you can set Facebook to display all comments by default. install this extension make that works for you.

Works on:
- Any post
- Any language

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Find more extensions: This is a promotional link if you want to discover more browser extensions developed by ESUIT.
Buy me a coffee: If you'd like to support our future updates and maintenance, you can use this feature to buy us a cup of coffee.
Report a bug: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Rate Chrome Store options: If you enjoy using this extension, you can click here to rate it.

Warning

this extension is not officially developed by Facebook‚Ñ¢, The author is @William Chen
